meanings.definition: The act of stealing a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dognaping of the neighbor's puppy caused a lot of sadness.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to prevent dognaping incidents in the area.
meanings.sent3: When the mischievous cat joked about dognaping, the dogs just wagged their tails.
meanings.sent4: The dognaping of the beloved pet left a hole in their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The news of the dognaping spread like wildfire, alarming all pet owners.

meanings.definition: The crime of taking a dog without permission.
meanings.sent1: The police were called to investigate the dognaping of the celebrity's dog.
meanings.sent2: The dognaping case was solved thanks to a vigilant neighbor who witnessed the incident.
meanings.sent3: The dognaping suspect tried to disguise the dog with a funny hat, but it didn't fool anyone.
meanings.sent4: The dognaping ring was finally busted after months of investigation.
meanings.sent5: The community organized a neighborhood watch to prevent any future dognaping attempts.
